ShaderNodePreset.Description:
This Matchbox shader creates a simple torch like flame.
Setup:
- Detail: adjust the noise detail of the flame - Speed: adjust the speed of the flame animation - Offset: offset the animation in time
Demo clip: https://vimeo.com/128056903
Original shader by Xavier Benech www.shadertoy.com/view/XsXSWS
